= Introduction =

= Tables =
The prefix of the database is specified by user. Here we take `bhw_` as example.


== 文体 ==
{{{
CREATE TABLE `btm_literature` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
  `name` varchar(80) NOT NULL COMMENT '原始名称',
  `language` varchar(30) default NULL COMMENT '语言',
  `official_site_url` varchar(200) default NULL,
  `producer` varchar(60) default NULL COMMENT '监督 出品人',
  `author` varchar(60) default NULL COMMENT '作者',
  `region` varchar(30) default NULL COMMENT '地区',
  `start_time` int(11) default NULL,
  `end_time` int(11) default NULL,
  `total_episode` int(11) default NULL COMMENT '总集数\0e\0',
  `minute_each_episode` int(11) default NULL COMMENT '每集分钟数\0R\0a\0',
  `placard_url` varchar(200) default NULL COMMENT '海报',
  PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `id` (`id`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
}}}
